Name: Twilight bride :VORMSLEGEND
About the game: Twilight bride :VORMSLEGEND a new character makes a grand debut - Alice!! Looking forward to your unlocking~~ Here we are, with our latest puzzle game 'Twilight bride :VORMSLEGEND', The inspiration of the game mainly comes from the story 'fingers' in 'Lilith's Cave: the supernatural story of the Jews'. Why do you play this game? 'Twilight bride :VORMSLEGEND' is the second puzzle game of our team. After the test of our last 'Mr. zombie', everyone's comments let us rearrange our positioning of the puzzle game. This time, 'Twilight bride :VORMSLEGEND' we no longer focus on terrorist elements, but only humorous stories here. The goal of the team at the beginning of its establishment is to make happy games. I hope the game of 'Twilight bride :VORMSLEGEND' can bring happiness to everyone. Why steam? TTwilight bride :VORMSLEGEND is the hard work of everyone in the development team. Throughout the development process, everyone is trying to make the game more interesting and fun. One game can't meet everyone's preferences. Thanks to all the friends who have spent time and played our games, we will continue to work hard to make more interesting games. We also hope Twilight bride :VORMSLEGEND can bring happiness to more players. About the style of the game In terms of theme style and art style, we are also trying to find our own art style. Try to make a variety of different styles. Friends who have played other games should see that the painting style of each of our current products is different. This is a long and difficult process, but it is also the way we must go. We also hope that one day in the future, when you see a picture, you can recognize that it is our game. I hope you can give us more time to precipitate and accumulate. Thank you again for your support! How to play this game During the game, players need to switch the corresponding characters in different scenes to get the corresponding clues, continue your adventure, and experience different stories from the perspectives of Philip, Alice and Sofia. Maybe they will have a deeper understanding of the story！
Developers: 深圳市元计划科技有限公司
Publishers: 杭州悦动互娱科技有限公司
